@MONKSTOWNBC @dlrcc @DunLaoghaireBID @DLR_Chamber Unfortunately not, this was the just revenue budget. Issues for those type of facilities will be debated in the capital programme in February 2019. Please keep in touch.

DLR Councillors have approved a ‚Ç¨184m budget for 2019. It includes increased funding across all divisions, prioritising housing, services and improving public spaces in our towns and villages.
